issue.title: Replace Boost.Process with cpp-subprocess
issue.body:
Closes https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/24907.

This PR is based on **theStack**'s [work](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/24907#issuecomment-1466087049).

I've fixed Windows-related bugs and issues and commenced submitting patches to [upstream](https://github.com/arun11299/cpp-subprocess).

For more details, please refer to commit messages.

committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1701619460 +0000

test: Fix test by checking the actual exception instance

The BOOST_REQUIRE_THROW passes even if the command raises an exception
in the underlying subprocess implementation, which might have a type
derived from std::runtime_error.

events.message:
test: Fix test by checking the actual exception instance

The BOOST_REQUIRE_THROW passes even if the command raises an exception
in the underlying subprocess implementation, which might have a type
derived from std::runtime_error.

comments.body:
Could use `HasReason()`.
```c++
BOOST_CHECK_EXCEPTION(RunCommandParseJSON(command), std::runtime_error, HasReason("Unable to parse JSON"));
```
